title: Beyond Our Dreams
description: Drama is inescapable in Ashford Falls. Follow the tangled lives of billionaire patriarch Carter Hedison, his heirs Rachel and Blake, Dr. Paul Kirkwood, and Nurse Helen Caldwell.
quote: These heart-lung-liver transplants are almost routine. He’ll be as good as new.
producer: Jack Gable, Lou Sherwood, Arlene Sherwood
alt1: Rachel and the Dr. stand above her father in a hospital bed
alt2: nurse Helen’s hand touches Carter Hedison’s hand
alt4: Helen peers through a hospital door window
